s_synopsis: An armed robbery is underway at a bank. The air bike cop starts his pursuit of the criminals. Hit them and arrest all of the bad guys, along with their Boss. A simple to play machine in which you can actually experience the sense of speed. The appearance of numerous characters and the variety of each round are sure to keep the players constantly interested in challenging the A. B. COP. Contains many colorful action-packed scenes to attract a wide spectrum of customers, a feature that is certain to result in stabilized high earnings over a long period of time...
